targets.expr: count(kube_node_labels{label_role="[[role]]"})
sum (machine_cpu_cores{role="[[role]]"})
sum (machine_memory_bytes{role="[[role]]"})

sum(irate( node_network_receive_bytes_total[5m] ) * on (instance) group_left(label_role)
    max by (instance,label_role) (
        label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_role="[[role]]"}, "instance","$1","node","(.*)")
    ))

    ))

sum(kube_pod_status_phase) by (phase)

sort(topk(5, sum (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", container!="", pod!=""}[5m])) by (pod_name, namespace)))
